name: Sunday Brunch: Serious Bacon-Cheese Hot Dogs
description: On Labor Day weekend I'm always thinking hot dogs and hamburgers when it comes to food. Although I love a plain, simple grilled hot dog, this holiday weekend I have decided to make what I call serious bacon-cheese hot dogs,...
recipeIngredient: 4 American cheese slices, cut into 1/2-inch strips
A softened stick of salted or sweet butter
Deli mustard and sweet pickle relish for condiments

recipeInstructions.text: Make a lengthwise slit in each of the hot dogs. Place the cheese strips in the slits. Wrap each hot dog in a strip of bacon, securing the ends with toothpicks.
Slip each hot dog into a bun; serve with the mustard and relish.
